Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a movable player.

    References:
    Dillon, A. (2015). Picasso (Version 2) [Software]. Retrieved from https://github.com/Hopding/Picasso.

    Since:
    1.2
    Version:
    1.11

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(javafx.scene.Group componentsGroup,
              double cWidth,
              double cHeight)
        Constructor for the Player class. Initializes all variables adds it to the scene.

        1.3 - Chris Trevisan
        Added player walking animation into an ArrayList.

        1.4 - Chris Trevisan
        Added left walking animation into an ArrayList.

        1.3 - Julia Xie
        Added walking animation with a bag into an ArrayList.

        Parameters:
        componentsGroup - the group which the player is added to
        cWidth - the width of the scene
        cHeight - the height of the scene
        Since:
        1.2
